Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your experience significantly. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I understand everyone has their own valuation criteria. Considering its worth and the effort put into it, I am offering you the chance to acquire it for $150. I trust this price reflects its true value and provides you with a great opportunity to benefit from its features. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
